name: Neutron Escape
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 39 "Running out of Power"

Neutron Escape is an exciting new game, where you, the owner of a wondrous pair of Bionotech’s Nuclear Feet, must out run an explosion! Try out this explosive game now at one of the links below, and you might find yourself running out of a power plant!

Credits 
  • HitchH1k3r (@HitchH1k3r, hitchh1k3rsguide.com)
